Summary: round, bright, larger then Jupiter, about the size of my thumb nail
divs: Sighting DetailsStanding on my deck overlooking downtown to my south. Saw a bright object moving from east to west approx. 10 degrees above horizon. The fast speed & brightness of object caught my eye. It stopped suddenly & made a dirrect turn upward then disapeared over NORAD. It made no sound & just disapeared in a clear night. I knew immediately it was a UFO as I've had many sightings since moving to Colorado Springs 27 yrs ago. I came back into my house to get my binoculars, but was unable to find anything like it in the night sky. The moon was setting approx.1:30 o'clock. Jupiter was rising approx.10:00 o'clock. This object was about 4 times larger then Jupiter & brighter then the moon. The sighting did not disturb me as I've had other sightings throughout Colorado. Did get my roommate when I got my binoculars hoping for a second opinion but the sky was devoid of anything that big & bright.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There was one other sighting in Colorado Springs on or around August 26th 2009
